hp.default: Default max hit points of opponent (int)
hp.rng: Random number dice rolls for generating max hit points: [rolls, dice, plus](array of ints)

speed: Enemy speed in feet per action
stats: Character stats and modifiers for opponent where values are arrays with: [`base`, `modifier`] (object)
languages: Languages opponent can speak [array of strings]
xp: Experience points gained when defeating opponent (int)
